items.name: Oco Wireless Surveillance HD Video Monitoring Security Camera 720P Night Vision and 2 Way Sound Motion & Detection - No more monthly fee
items.shortDescription: Oco is an easy-to-use, smart-enabled WiFi camera for monitoring everything you care about. Security and peace of mind is yours 24/7 with Oco. View live, streaming video over the Web any time and set alerts to receive notification of any actions, movement or changes in the camera's view. Monitor your office location whether it's in part of the home, in a separate garage or other structure or downtown in your business district. You're covered everywhere there's WiFi and power with Oco! You can see for yourself that your children are safe even while you're gone — inside or outside the home. You can enable settings to receive notification of any motion or sound detected, providing added security without the need to constantly monitor a screen. Now it's your turn to take care of them. Increasing safety for your elderly parents is made easy with Oco.
items.longDescription: <strong>Oco Wireless HD Video Monitoring Smart Camera:</strong><br><ul class="noindent"><li>Easy installation</li><li>Watch live video of whatever place you're securing</li><li>Live stream online anywhere</li><li>High definition with 1280 x 720 pixels</li><li>Up to 30 days of video in cloud</li><li>See in the dark</li><li>Communicate your voice message</li><li>Sound and motion detection</li><li>Color: black</li></ul>

items.name: DOGTEK Sonic Birdhouse Bark Control
items.shortDescription: DOGTEK's Sonic Birdhouse has the appearance of an ordinary birdhouse but in fact, it's a state of the art bark control device the uses high-pitched ultrasonic sound technology to deter unwanted barking from either your or your or your neighbor's dogs! How does it work? When the DOGTEK Sonic Birdhouse is within range of a barking dog, the internal microphones sense the barking and the unit is triggered automatically. The DOGTEK Sonic Birdhouse emits an ultrasonic sound which is heard by dogs but is not detected by humans. The dog will stop barking when The DOGTEK Sonic Birdhouse emits it high-pitched, safe and effective tone. The dog will begin to associate their bark with this unpleasant noise. When the dog stops barking the ultrasonic tone will also stop. The DOGTEK Sonic Birdhouse has three sensitivity levels and a test mode to choose from. It is effective up to 50 feet.
items.longDescription: <br><b>DOGTEK Sonic Birdhouse Bark Control:</b><ul><li>3 built-in bark sensors + 1 XL ultrasonic loudspeaker</li><li>Detects barking up to 50'</li><li>4 sensitivity settings to indicate what barking level activates the unit</li><li>Effective on all dogs within range</li><li>Weatherproof and durable for outdoor as well as indoor use</li></ul>

items.name: Night Owl Executive Camera Pen (4GB Internal Memory)
items.shortDescription: The Night Owl Executive Camera Pen is perfect for busy professionals — offering users the ability to record video (640 x 480), audio (from up to 20 feet away) and take notes simultaneously. This handsomely designed retractable USB camera pen has a black finish with silver plated accents. However, unlike ordinary executive pens, the Night Owl Executive Camera Pen also boasts a built-in compact camera, which can record up to 90 minutes of video with audio. With an impressive 640 x 680 resolution and 4GB of internal memory, files can be transferred by easily unscrewing the USB camera pen and inserting the pen USB directly into your computer. The pen with video recording is compatible with both Windows and Mac computers and includes three additional black ballpoint ink refills.
items.longDescription: <p><b>Night Owl Executive Camera Pen (4GB Internal Memory):</b></p><ul><li>Record full motion video and audio</li><li>Easily transfer files via the attached USB port</li><li>PC and Mac compatible</li><li>Retractable black ballpoint pen with three refills included</li><li>Recording format is AVI at 640 x 480 resolution</li><li>Night Owl NOPEN-4GB-B camera pen includes 4GBs of internal memory and rechargeable lithium battery</li></ul>

items.name: Summer Infant Sure Sight Extra Video Camera
items.shortDescription: For parents wanting to monitor multiple rooms or children, additional cameras can be added to the Summer Infant Sure Sight Video Monitoring System with this Summer Infant Sure Sight Extra Video Camera (up to four total). Parents can view each room using the auto-scan feature (8-second interval) or manually control the views between rooms.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Summer Infant Sure Sight Extra Video Camera:</b><ul><li>Up to 4 cameras (each sold separately) can be used with the Sure Sight Summer Infant Extra Video Camera (sold separately)</li><li>Tabletop or wall mountable (wall anchor and security clips included)</li><li>AC adapted included</li><li>The baby video camera features automatic black-and-white night vision</li><li>Microphone focues on baby's voice while filtering out background noise</li><li>The baby monitoring system includes 1 camera</li></ul><br><b>Questions about product recalls?</b><br>Items that are a part of a recall are removed from the Walmart.com site, and are no longer available for purchase. Customers who have purchased a recalled item will be notified by email or by letter sent to the address given at the time of purchase. For complete recall information, go to <a href="http:/walmartstores.com/Recalls/" target="_blank">Walmart Recalls</a>.

items.longDescription: Brand new High quality mini DV camera Spy Pen! Use this pen to record discretely and also write like a normal ballpoint pen. Memory card is not included.

items.name: Brinks 180-Degree 2-Head with Head Motion Activated Security Light
items.shortDescription: <p>Keep key areas well lit for added safety with the Brinks Security Light. This powerful light is ideal for keeping the perimeter of homes and businesses more secure. The 2-head with head motion activated light senses motion within a 180 degree range, picking up movement quickly and activating the two floodlights for bright illumination. The two lights can be tilted and adjusted to point to different areas. The 180-degree motion activated security light can be placed over doors, back porches and patios, shed doors and under eaves and even awnings for easy installation.</p>
items.longDescription: <p><b>Brinks 2 Head 180-Degree Flood Light:</b></p><ul><li>Provides excellent light at night</li><li>Helps to create a sense of extra security and comfort</li><li>180-degrees of coverage</li><li>Available in multiple finishes</li><li>Choose from bronze or white</li></ul>

items.name: Ezviz BD-1424B1 Ezviz 4-Channel 1080p Analog Security System with 1TB HDD and 4 Weatherproof 1080p Bullet Cameras
items.shortDescription: Protect your space with the Ezviz 4-Channel 1080p Analog HD System with 1TB Hard Drive and Four Weatherproof Bullet Cameras. Getting started is simple with no router configuration needed and a robust mobile app that allows you to set up, configure and view your videos. Plus, you can be alerted on your mobile device if the cameras sense movement. Data is protected with triple-layer security including bank-level encryption to safeguard the moments you capture.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Ezviz BD-1424B1 Ezviz 4-Channel 1080p Analog Security System with 1TB HDD and 4 Weatherproof 1080p Bullet Cameras:</b><ul><li>Crystal-clear 1080p HD security system, 4-channel DVR with 1TB HDD, 4 weatherproof bullet cameras</li><li>Ezviz robust app allows you to set up, configure and view your videos</li><li>Zero router configuration</li><li>Be alerted via push notifications on your mobile devices if the cameras sense movement</li><li>Triple-layer security to safeguard your remote view and the precious moments you capture</li></ul>

items.name: Trademark Driveway Patrol Infrared Wireless Home Security Alarm System
items.shortDescription: The Trademar Driveway Patrol Alarm System is a completely wireless alert system. Use it to monitor the mailbox, garage, driveway or a wide range of other places. Simply place the sensor most anywhere on the property and the receiver in your house up to 400' away and you are ready to go. The Wireless Driveway Alarm System with battery operation and 400' range means no wiring is necessary. When a vehicle or person passes the sensor, the receiver emits a pleasant chiming sound that provides you with advance notice that someone is approaching. With this Home Security Infrared Alarm System, you will get peace of mind knowing that your family is safe from unwanted intruders.
items.longDescription: The Trademar Driveway Patrol Alarm System is a completely wireless alert system. Use it to monitor the mailbox, garage, driveway or a wide range of other places. Simply place the sensor most anywhere on the property and the receiver in your house up to 400' away and you are ready to go. items.name: KGuard Security QRT-303 720p Infrared Night Vision Wireless Network Camera w/Pan
items.longDescription: KGUARD's Wi-Fi IP camera's 720P high resolution provides high definition videos and images. 720P resolution is 200% higher than D1 resolution and 900% higher than CIF resolution. With its pan/tilt auto cruise function, you can set up to 9 different points for a more comprehensive view. Speed and angle are adjustable for each route, so you can decide where and when to see the best view. Also, using motion technology to focus on some important areas where you want to protect. The camera will record the images and send an email to you once it detects moving objects. Furthermore, KGUARD provides free Viewer app for iOS and Android system to allow for remote monitoring anywhere and anytime. Combined with QR code, only three steps can complete setup. No PC required. Just plug in the camera and connect to the Internet by pressing WPS button. Download the free Viewer app and use the device to scan and QR code. Once the scan is complete, you can use your device right away.Features:H.264 recording compression720p resolution provides excellent HD images2-way Audio - built-in mic with audio range of 5m/16ftPan & Tilt Range: Horizontal: 355°, Vertical: 90°12-LED - Night vision up to 10m /33ft in total darknessSupports WPS function for easier connection to the networkSupports SD card up to 32GBIndoor useVideo Specifications:30fps:1280 x 720 pixels640 x 368 pixels320 x 208 pixelsColor during the day, switches to B at nightMaximum Streams: 2 Simultaneous StreamsCamera Specifications:Megapixel Color CMOS Sensor1 MegapixelsLens: 3.mm fixed, F1.2Viewing Angle: 70° Minimum Illumination: 3-8 Lux Network Specifications:Wired Interface: Ethernet 10/100Mbps RJ-45Wireless Interface: IEEE 802.11b/g/n (150Mbps)Plug & Play, WPSONVCIF supportPackage Includes:QRT-303 Network CameraQuick Installation GuideSoftware & User Manual CD3.5mm Male to Dual Female cable adapterAC/DC Power AdapterRJ45 CableScrew Kit, Bracket

items.name: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 (PS3) - Pre-Owned
items.shortDescription: Modern Warfare 3 delivers a full assault on gamers' senses, including an intense single-player campaign that picks up immediately following the events of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 and escalates into World War 3, as well as groundbreaking upgrades to the beloved Special Ops like the all-new Survival Mode. Special Ops serves as the perfect springboard to Modern Warfare 3's re-imagined multiplayer, featuring the series' trademark visceral gun-on-gun combat, a revamped pointstreak system with the introduction of "Strike Packages," devastating new modes like "Kill Confirmed" and other gameplay enhancements, new features and a bevy of new weapons, equipment, and perks.
items.longDescription: <ul><li>Pointstreaks and Strike Packages: Killstreaks, benefits and abilities awarded for stringing together multiple kills, have been transformed into Pointstreaks, creating a system that rewards players both for landing kills and completing objectives. These rewards have been broken up into three different categories, known as Strike Packages:</li><li>Assault - Pointstreaks within this package chain together and deal direct damage. It includes classics like the Predator Missile and Attack Helicopter. Your streak resets on death.</li><li>Support - Pointstreaks within this package do not chain, focusing instead on surveillance and disruption. Your streak does not reset on death meaning they will respawn with you.</li><li>Specialist - Pointstreaks within this package are designed for advanced players. Rewards come in the form of additional perks for optimal performance. These perks last until death.</li><li>Weapon Proficiencies: Just like your player, weapons now rank up, unlocking additional attachments, reticules, camos and the new proficiency category. Weapon Proficiencies not only allow you to get better with weapons, they also allow you customize your weapons with helpful attributes such as "Kick" for reduced recoil, "Impact" for deeper penetration through hard surfaces and much more. Many proficiencies are specific to their weapons class. And all are geared towards enhancing a certain play style and can allow for efficient use of your favorite weapons in maps and game modes in which they might not otherwise be the best choice.</li><li>Modes and Match Customization: Along with the return of the fan favorites Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 introduces several new game modes. Collect dog tags from killed players, including those on your squad while you prevent the opposing squad from taking yours in Kill Confirmed mode. In Team Defender mode, grab the flag and protect the flag carrier for as long as you can to increase your team's score. In addition players will enjoy user generated match mode functionality which allows you to configure any mode how you want it and then share these over the Call of Duty: Elite online service.</li><li>2-player Co-op Special Ops Survival Mode: Special Ops cooperative action returns with a bevy of additions, including 16 new objective-based missions and the all-new Survival Mode. Team up online, locally, or play solo and face endless waves of attacking enemies throughout every multiplayer map. Purchase and customize your weapons, air support, equipment and abilities to stand up against increasingly difficult forces and land a spot on the leaderboards. Earn experience and rank up with the newly implemented progression system. The higher the rank, the more weapons, air support, and gear armories you will have available to customize so you can change your tactics on the fly. In addition to the action packed battle for freedom, the cooperative Survival Mode also serves as an effective training tool for competitive multiplayer action.</li><li>Call of Duty: Elite: Call of Duty: Elite is an online multiplayer oriented service launched simultaneously with Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3. The service offers both free and subscription based levels of access and is dedicated to the game franchise, featuring lifetime statistics across multiple games, social-networking options, competitions, a mobile app, Facebook integration and more.</li><li>ESRB Rating: MATURE with Blood and Gore, Strong Language, Drug Reference, and Intense Violence</li></ul>

items.name: Defender Sentinel Wireless 4 CH 1TB DVR with 2 Wireless 520TVL Cameras
items.longDescription: Defender® Wireless Security System can be used to monitor video in any indoor or outdoor space at any time of the day. This wireless plug and play system allows for easy set up. The wireless, weather resistant cameras included with this system have 24 infrared LEDs that allow you to see up to 75ft in the dark. Ideal for monitoring what matters most.<br><br><b>ClearVu™ Digital Wireless Technology</b><br>ClearVu™ digital wireless technology makes set-up hassle free. This advanced system automatically connects when turned on - no wiring required. Superior digital functionality ensures that the signals remain strong as you monitor your business or home wirelessly, up to 450ft away.<br><br><b>Long Range Night Vision</b><br> See it all in pristine detail, day or night: 520 TVL cameras with 75ft night vision leave nothing to the imagination. The indoor/outdoor camera provides you with a clear, secure picture, even when you monitor after-hours in a dark location. The camera comes equipped with advanced night vision that let you see clearly in the dark, up to 75ft away! The LED activates automatically when it gets dark.<br><br><b>Smartphone Viewing in 1 Step™</b><br> Defender®'s free 1 Step™ Remote Viewing software instantly networks your DVR with the Internet. View your video feeds live, receive instant email alerts and watch any previously recorded footage from anywhere in the world with an Internet connection on your smartphone, tablet or computer.<br><br><b>1TB Delivers Two Years of Memory</b><br>The included 1TB HDD allows for continuous monitoring and can store over two years' worth of recorded footage. Maximize available memory with motion activated recording and H.264 compression technology. DVR alerts will activate to notify user when HDD is full. Back up and transfer footage to USB flash drive or external hard drive via USB port.<br><br><b>True Do-It-Yourself Security</b><br>Defender®'s wireless Phoenix™ Pro system gives you all the peace of mind of a professionally installed system with the satisfaction that comes from knowing you did it all yourself. Don't leave the safety of your property to chance - trust Defender® to help you protect what you value most.<br><br><b>What's Included:</b><br>4CH 1TB DVR, 2 PHOENIX™ wireless cameras, 3 PHOENIX™ receivers, 10 power adapters, 6 video cables with BNC adapters, mounting hardware, IR remote controller with batteries, 4 window warning stickers, instruction manual & software CD, quick start guide, USB mouse, ethernet cable, 1 year warranty, lifetime customer support.

items.longDescription: Feature:<br>• Built-in flashing light<br>• Built-in light sensor will turn on flash light at night automatically<br>• A power switch can shut off flash light when you need<br>• Fake IR LEDs<br>• Can be mounted on wall or ceiling<br>• Easy and quick to install<br>• Cheap and effective way to deter criminals<br>• Looks extremely realistic with the fake lens and fake IR illuminators in real camera housing<br>• Power requires: 2 x 1.5V AAA batteries (not included) <br><br>Description:<br>VideoSecu supplies a broad variety of high-quality, well-designed and easy-installed security cameras at affordable prices. items.longDescription: <p><b>Trademark Security Camera Decoy with Blinking LED and Adjustable Mount:</b></p><ul><li>LED light</li><li>No wiring needed</li><li>Installation screws included</li><li>Adjustable base allows you to set angle of the camera</li><li>Home security camera is not a functioning camera</li><li>Realistic appearance when mounted</li><li>Requires 2 AAA batteries (not included)</li><li>Measures: 7.5" x 3.25" x 6.25"</li></ul>

items.name: GE Wireless Alarm System Kit
items.shortDescription: <p>Safeguard your house with the GE wireless alarm system kit. This system is comprised of a door alarm and three window alarms that are very easy to setup and use. The wireless design of this security alarm system is completely hassle-free and a four-digit keypad lets you set a security code to further enhance the safety of your home and family. The 120-decibel alarm gives out warning tones when someone tries to break in or even if somebody leaves unexpectedly so nobody comes or goes without you knowing. The door alarm operates on three AAA batteries and this GE alarm system also features an alarm delay feature to give you time to get to the keypad. The three window alarms run on four LR44 batteries. This GE alarm system is a great product to make your home more secure. The quick, wireless installation means you can secure any home with minimal fuss, whether an apartment or house.</p>
items.longDescription: <strong>GE 51107 120 Decibel Home Alarm System:</strong><ul><li>Easy to install</li><li>No wiring necessary</li><li>Door alarm uses four-digit keypad to set security code for arming/disarming</li><li>Door alarm delay feature to avoid false triggering</li><li>Three window alarms included in this security alarm system</li><li>All alarms are 120 decibel for unmissable alerts</li><li>Door alarm requires 3 AAA batteries (Not Included)</li><li>Each window alarm requires 4 LR44 batteries (Included)</li></ul>
